Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate, read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 827.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Wildcat Brook in the State of New Hampshire for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add the Wildcat Brook (New Hampshire), from its headwaters to its confluence with the Ellis River (including Bog Brook), to the list of rivers designated for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system. Requires the study of Wildcat Brook to be completed within ten years. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate Wildcat Brook in the State of New Hampshire for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.
